text: The frailty of Skavenslaves makes them the perfect fuse for a warpstone keg explosion.
Build fortresses, protect homes, and revel in the joy of Valaya's brew!
The forge burns bright, the hammer rings, and a divine weapon is forged!
The cannon roars, the smoke clears, and the mountains tremble in song!
Slay the dragon, conquer the wilds, and cleanse the Chaos beasts!
Jade Taoist Rune Spells are a unique development of the Wind of Qi. Casters store magical winds in talismans for later use, providing potent support despite limited control.
Hong Ying is the Moon Empress's most trusted Dragonborn Lord, rumored to carry the mysterious bloodline of the Shadow Dragon. He oversees the Gui Po Division and commands the Obsidian Crows.
Constructed from jade, these creatures boast incredible resilience and can draw power from the Winds of Magic.
Sharp weapons and heavy armor are delectable treats for this iron-consuming beast!
These prototypes of the Dragon Emperor's creations cannot fully stabilize the power of the Aether Winds but still instill fear in their enemies.
Those who disturb the Tomb Kings' rest will face the wrath of ancient tyrant souls.
Infused with destructive magic, the many-headed hydra spews dark flames with unparalleled vitality.
Though slow-moving, the Black Ark provides exceptional ranged and magical support, with the ability to extinguish surrounding flames with its tidal waves.
Summoning it requires a price, whether in others' blood or your own.
A light touch may numb you, severe weakness will set in, or worse—your heart will be pierced before your eyes.
The black soul of Malus Darkblade and the cunning demon Tzarkan are temporarily separated, but it won't last long.
This unit possesses unparalleled combat prowess. May you continue to write their legendary tale!
The power of Kurnous flows in their veins. They serve directly under the King of the Forest in the Wild Hunt.
These spectral blue bows absorb their wielder's malice to create even deadlier arrows, but have no effect on allies.
This unit is a professional combat engineer team with unique abilities to construct devices and weapons in battle.
This unit is particularly vulnerable to [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_flaming.png]][[/img]] fire damage.
This unit's ranged attacks have limited range.
This unit can replenish ammunition for allies.
Thunder Cannons fire massive shells that deal enormous damage to single entities but are less effective against groups.
Once deployed, the Thunder Cannon remains stationary for the duration of the battle.
Mjolnir, the divine hammer gifted to Hafdan by Thor, can be hurled with lightning force to shatter enemies—then instantly returns to his hand.
